description: Styles for the Search Bar component including layout and appearance for search input, buttons, and icons.

classes.name: search-bar
classes.description: Container for the search bar with flex layout.

classes.name: search-input
classes.description: Input field for search queries with styling for height, background color, and shadow.

classes.name: search-icon
classes.description: Icon displayed within the search input, using an SVG for the search graphic.

classes.name: search-text
classes.description: Text styles used within the search input, including font settings.

classes.name: filter-button
classes.description: Button styled for filtering search results, including dimensions and background color.

classes.name: filter-icon
classes.description: Icon displayed on the filter button using an SVG graphic.
